fields.name: displayError
fields.fieldText: You were asked to decide if you wanted to create a new record or edit the existing one. If you're seeing this screen, we can't figure out which choice you picked.

fields.name: displayAdjustmentsText
fields.fieldText:
Adjustments?


If you wish to edit the answers in the existing profile or create an entirely new one, select one of the options below and go to the next window.

fields.fieldText: Recap of Customer Notes

fields.name: editExistingReasonFoErSignUp
fields.fieldText: What was the motivation between signing up now?

fields.name: editExistingWaitNarrative
fields.fieldText: For how long have you waited to get it done?

fields.fieldText: What is the reason you have been hesitant to get it done?

fields.fieldText: What's the reason you're ready to do it now?

fields.name: plRecapGrandChildrenOlderThan18
fields.fieldText: Are all grandchildren more than 18 years old?

fields.name: plRecapFortuneGap
fields.fieldText: Is there a large gap in their fortunes?

fields.fieldText: Do they have value in stocks?

fields.fieldText: Do they have a pension plan?

fields.fieldText: Are they free to change it?

fields.fieldText: Do they have a Life Insurance?

fields.fieldText: Do they have a Home Contents Insurance?

fields.name: displayDoYouWantToUpdate
fields.fieldText: Do you want to make updates to the above?

fields.name: displayHeaderUpdateSuccess
fields.fieldText:
Success


You've successfully updated the existing record!

fields.name: longReasonForSignUp
fields.fieldText: What's the reason you signed up?

fields.name: longCustomerWaitingTime
fields.fieldText: For how long, have you thought about it?

fields.name: longReasonForWait
fields.fieldText: What kept you from getting it done?

fields.name: longReasonForStartNow
fields.fieldText: What's the reason you've decided to get it done now?

fields.name: radBioOrBlendedChildren
fields.fieldText: Are they Biological or Blended Children?

fields.name: displayChildrenNotRequiredIfThereAreNone
fields.fieldText: In case there are no children, leave the below fields empty in the box "Add Child".

fields.name: curHouseEquity
fields.fieldText: What is the approximate equity in the house?

fields.name: radHasVacationHome
fields.fieldText: Do you have a vacation home?

fields.name: currAmountOfSavings
fields.fieldText: How much money in savings, approximately?

fields.name: currAmountOfValueInStocks
fields.fieldText: How much value in stocks, approximately?

fields.name: radExpectingInheritance
fields.fieldText: Do you expect to inherit anything?

fields.name: currExpectedInheritance
fields.fieldText: How much do you expect to inherit, approximately?

fields.name: radIsFortuneDifferent
fields.fieldText: Is there a big difference in the size of your individual fortunes?

fields.name: displaySliderExplanation
fields.fieldText:
If Person 1 owns everything, move slider all the way to the left to -100.


If Person 2 owns everything, move slider all the way to the right to 100.

value.stringValue: How much does your fortune differ?

fields.name: hasPensionPlan
fields.fieldText: Do you have a pension plan?

fields.name: radCanMovePensionPlan
fields.fieldText: Are you free to move your pension plan to another provider?

fields.name: currPerson1PensionPlanValue
fields.fieldText: Approximate value of Person 1's pension plan

fields.name: currPerson2PensionPlanValue
fields.fieldText: Approximate value of Person 2's pension plan

fields.name: radHasLifeInsurance
fields.fieldText: Do you have a life insurance?

fields.name: hasHomeContentsInsurance
fields.fieldText: Do you have a home contents insurance?

fields.name: radHasLargePets
fields.fieldText: Do you have any larger pets?
fields.helpText:
This could for example be a hippopotamus, a narwhale or another extraordinarily large pet.


Other large pets, such as enourmous dogs, horses, cows or the like, are not counted as large pets, for the purposes of this survey.
